docs.abstract: Alva Noe letter scores New York City over suit against tobacco companies
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As a 31-year-old former smoker who was until recently a New Yorker, I am ashamed that New York City is bringing suit against tobacco companies (news article, Oct. 18). Smoking is one of many pleasurable activities -- like drinking alcohol, eating meat and cooking with butter -- that are harmful to one's health.
